channel.title: Msn Myspace virus help
channel.description:
okk my gayy ass bro got the msn myspace virus thing.. the one that sends u a myspace link wit ur email on it. i googled sum stuff up it said to run hijackthis n save the log file.. but i dont know what to do after this do i have to delete all the files..??? cuz i dont think i am supposed to delete all the files it shows.. but i not sure which files i am supose to delete n which ones i am supposed to keep. here is the log file

item.title: Msn Myspace virus help
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Why is the process “C:\WINNT\winlogon.exe” running twice?

I know what this is…
Someone pretends to send you pictures for their MySpace. You download them and find out it is a *.exe file.

Look at every single process that you do not know about and Google it!
Then Scan your WINNT directory with a virus scanner because that is where most harmful viruses are placed.

Read full topic

soo shud i juss run avast n scan the system??

just download a decent antivirus program.

item.title: Msn Myspace virus help
item.dc:creator: @darkilla darkilla
item.description:
@darkilla wrote:

okk my gayy ass bro got the msn myspace virus thing… the one that sends u a myspace link wit ur email on it.
i googled sum stuff up it said to run hijackthis n save the log file… but i dont know what to do after this
do i have to delete all the files…??? cuz i dont think i am supposed to delete all the files it shows… but i not sure which files i am supose to delete n which ones i am supposed to keep.
here is the log file
